name: Scylla
description: The barbaric gesture doesn't match its elegant appearance.

set.2: Equipping this matrix on the current weapon increases crit damage by **13%**/16%/19%/23% and shatter by **13%**/16%/19%/23%.
set.4: Equipping 2 or more weapons of different elements or types increases all elemental damage by **9.5%**/11.5%/13.5%/15.5%. The effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
